subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jon Bon Jovi knows something about smash hits, and his latest one has nothing to do with another No. 1 album. The Soul, the team Bon Jovi co-owns, is 8-0.
snippet: Jon Bon Jovi knows something about smash hits, and his latest one has nothing to do with another No. 1 album. The Soul, the team Bon Jovi co-owns, is 8-0.
